name: Space Ducks: The great escape
description:
6Toad Games is a game making collective based in Barcelona, Spain.

Space Ducks: The great escape was made by Fernando García (@Taletronic), Clare Pearce (@FishTaod) and Grovel Studio (@GroovelStudio).

With the participation of artist Polyducks (@Polyducks), who kindly brought space travel to our Ducks, in the shape of a lean, mean, shiny low-polygon mesh.

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/6toadGames
Checkout-out our new titles: https://6toad.com
And come hang with us on Discord: https://discord.gg/3bZhTSRwgg
